query:
INSERT INTO exchange_feature_support (exchangeSlug, featureSlug, supported, levelZh, levelEn, detailZh, detailEn, maxLeverage, feeInfo, highlight) VALUES
-- OKX
('okx','spot',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','支持700+交易对，订单簿深度全球前二。提供高级订单类型（冰山订单、TWAP时间加权）。OKX Convert支持一键闪兑，无滑点。','700+ trading pairs, top-2 order book depth globally. Advanced order types (iceberg, TWAP). OKX Convert for instant swaps with no slippage.','10x','Maker 0.08% / Taker 0.1%',1),
('okx','futures',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','全球前二衍生品交易所，USDT/USDC/币本位永续合约，最高125倍杠杆。提供交割合约、期货期权，日均交易量超100亿美元。','Top-2 derivatives exchange globally. USDT/USDC/coin-margined perpetuals up to 125x. Delivery contracts and futures options. $10B+ daily volume.','125x','Maker -0.0025% / Taker 0.0075%（VIP负费率）',1),
('okx','margin',1,'完善','Complete','全仓/逐仓杠杆，最高10倍，支持400+交易对。提供借贷市场，用户可出借资产赚取利息。','Cross/isolated margin up to 10x, 400+ pairs. Lending market where users can lend assets for interest.','10x','同现货费率',0),
('okx','tradfi',1,'领先','Leading','OKX Jumpstart支持股票代币（部分地区）。提供黄金/白银等大宗商品追踪代币，以及加密指数产品。','OKX Jumpstart supports stock tokens (region-dependent). Gold/silver commodity tracking tokens and crypto index products.','N/A','同现货费率',0),
('okx','earn',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','简单赚币（活期/定期）、ETH质押、DeFi挖矿、结构化产品（双币赢）、链上赚币。OKX Earn APY最高可达30%+（高风险）。','Simple Earn (flexible/fixed), ETH staking, DeFi mining, structured products (Dual Currency), on-chain earn. APY up to 30%+ for high-risk.','N/A','无额外费用',1),
('okx','web3',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','OKX Web3钱包：支持80+公链，内置DEX聚合器（OKX DEX），NFT市场，跨链桥，DeFi仪表盘。是五大交易所中Web3功能最完整的平台。','OKX Web3 Wallet: 80+ chains, built-in DEX aggregator (OKX DEX), NFT marketplace, cross-chain bridge, DeFi dashboard. Most complete Web3 suite among top 5 CEXs.','N/A','Gas费由用户承担',1),
('okx','options',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','欧式期权，支持BTC/ETH/SOL等多个标的。提供期权策略组合（跨式、宽跨式等），专业期权交易界面，是五大中期权产品最丰富的交易所。','European options for BTC/ETH/SOL and more. Option strategy combinations (straddle, strangle, etc.). Most comprehensive options suite among top 5.','N/A','Maker 0.02% / Taker 0.03%',1),
('okx','copy',1,'完善','Complete','跟单广场，支持现货和合约跟单。显示交易员30天收益率、胜率、最大回撤。支持设置跟单金额上限和止损。','Copy trading for spot and futures. Shows 30-day ROI, win rate, max drawdown. Set copy amount limits and stop-loss.','N/A','跟单利润分成10%',0),
('okx','community',1,'完善','Complete','OKX广场：社区内容平台，支持发布文章、行情分析、跟随KOL。与OKX Learn教育内容整合。','OKX Square: community content platform for articles, market analysis, KOL following. Integrated with OKX Learn education content.','N/A','免费',0),
('okx','bot',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','网格机器人（现货/合约/无限网格）、DCA定投、套利机器人、信号机器人。支持TradingView信号接入，是五大中机器人功能最强的平台。','Grid bots (spot/futures/infinite grid), DCA, arbitrage, signal bots. TradingView signal integration. Most powerful bot suite among top 5.','N/A','策略收益分成',1),
('okx','otc',1,'完善','Complete','OKX P2P和OTC交易台，支持大额法币兑换，100+法币，提供专属客户经理服务。','OKX P2P and OTC desk for large fiat conversions, 100+ fiat currencies, dedicated account manager.','N/A','含在报价内',0),
('okx','launchpad',1,'完善','Complete','OKX Jumpstart：新项目代币首发平台，需持有OKB参与。历史项目包括多个DeFi和GameFi项目。','OKX Jumpstart: new token launch platform requiring OKB. Historical projects include multiple DeFi and GameFi projects.','N/A','免费参与',0),
('okx','ecosystem',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','OKB（平台币）：用于手续费折扣、Jumpstart参与。OKX Chain（OKC）：EVM兼容公链。X Layer：基于Polygon zkEVM的Layer2。NFT市场。','OKB token: fee discounts, Jumpstart access. OKX Chain (OKC): EVM-compatible. X Layer: Polygon zkEVM-based Layer2. NFT marketplace.','N/A','N/A',1),
-- Bybit
('bybit','spot',1,'良好','Good','支持500+交易对，流动性良好。提供现货网格交易，支持限价/市价/条件单。近年来现货业务快速扩张。','500+ trading pairs with good liquidity. Spot grid trading, limit/market/conditional orders. Rapid spot expansion in recent years.','10x','Maker 0.1% / Taker 0.1%',0),
('bybit','futures',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','全球前三衍生品交易所，USDT/USDC/币本位永续合约，最高100倍杠杆。以合约交易起家，风控机制完善，深受专业交易员青睐。','Top-3 derivatives exchange. USDT/USDC/coin-margined perpetuals up to 100x. Founded on futures trading, robust risk management, favored by professionals.','100x','Maker 0.01% / Taker 0.055%（最低费率之一）',1),
('bybit','margin',1,'完善','Complete','全仓/逐仓杠杆，最高10倍。提供统一保证金账户（UTA），可用一个账户管理现货、合约、期权保证金。','Cross/isolated margin up to 10x. Unified Trading Account (UTA) manages spot, futures, and options margin in one account.','10x','同现货费率',0),
('bybit','tradfi',1,'领先','Leading','Bybit MT5：提供外汇、美股CFD、商品CFD等传统金融产品，是五大中TradFi产品最丰富的平台。','Bybit MT5: forex, US stock CFDs, commodity CFDs. Most comprehensive TradFi product suite among top 5 CEXs.','N/A','差价含在报价内',1),
('bybit','earn',1,'完善','Complete','活期/定期理财、ETH/SOL质押、流动性挖矿、双币投资、结构化产品。Bybit Savings APY竞争力强。','Flexible/fixed savings, ETH/SOL staking, liquidity mining, dual investment, structured products. Competitive Bybit Savings APY.','N/A','无额外费用',0),
('bybit','web3',1,'完善','Complete','Bybit Web3钱包：支持多链，内置NFT市场（Bybit NFT），DEX聚合器，GameFi中心。','Bybit Web3 Wallet: multi-chain support, built-in NFT marketplace, DEX aggregator, GameFi hub.','N/A','Gas费由用户承担',0),
('bybit','options',1,'完善','Complete','欧式期权，支持BTC/ETH。提供期权策略工具，适合有经验的期权交易者。','European options for BTC/ETH. Option strategy tools for experienced traders.','N/A','Maker 0.02% / Taker 0.03%',0),
('bybit','copy',1,'完善','Complete','跟单交易，支持合约策略复制。显示交易员历史数据，支持设置跟单参数。','Copy trading for futures strategies. Historical trader data, customizable copy parameters.','N/A','跟单利润分成10%',0),
('bybit','community',1,'良好','Good','Bybit广场：社区内容平台，支持行情讨论和KOL内容。','Bybit Square: community content platform for market discussions and KOL content.','N/A','免费',0),
('bybit','bot',1,'完善','Complete','网格机器人（现货/合约）、DCA机器人、套利机器人。支持策略市场，可复制他人策略。','Grid bots (spot/futures), DCA bots, arbitrage bots. Strategy marketplace to copy others strategies.','N/A','策略收益分成',0),
('bybit','otc',1,'完善','Complete','Bybit P2P和OTC服务，支持大额法币兑换，提供专属报价。','Bybit P2P and OTC service for large fiat conversions with dedicated quotes.','N/A','含在报价内',0),
('bybit','launchpad',1,'完善','Complete','Bybit Launchpad：新项目代币首发，需持有BIT或完成任务参与。','Bybit Launchpad: new token launches requiring BIT or task completion.','N/A','免费参与',0),
('bybit','ecosystem',1,'完善','Complete','BIT（平台币）：用于手续费折扣和Launchpad。Mantle Network：Bybit支持的以太坊Layer2网络，TVL超10亿美元。','BIT token: fee discounts and Launchpad. Mantle Network: Bybit-backed Ethereum Layer2 with $1B+ TVL.','N/A','N/A',0),
-- Gate.io
('gate','spot',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','支持2200+交易对，上币速度最快，是新项目最先上线的平台之一。适合寻找早期小市值项目的投资者。','2200+ trading pairs, fastest new listing speed. One of the first platforms for new projects. Ideal for early-stage small-cap hunters.','10x','Maker 0.2% / Taker 0.2%（VIP可降至0.015%）',1),
('gate','futures',1,'良好','Good','USDT本位永续合约，最高100倍杠杆，支持400+合约交易对。流动性略逊于前三，但品种丰富。','USDT-margined perpetuals up to 100x, 400+ contract pairs. Liquidity slightly below top 3 but wide variety.','100x','Maker -0.015% / Taker 0.016%（Maker负费率）',1),
('gate','margin',1,'完善','Complete','全仓/逐仓杠杆，最高10倍。借贷市场利率透明，用户可出借资产赚取利息。','Cross/isolated margin up to 10x. Transparent lending market rates, users can lend for interest.','10x','同现货费率',0),
('gate','tradfi',1,'基础','Basic','提供部分股票代币化产品，覆盖范围相对有限。','Limited stock tokenization products.','N/A','同现货费率',0),
('gate','earn',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','Gate.io理财产品最丰富：活期/定期存款、质押、流动性挖矿、结构化产品、Hodl & Earn。支持2000+币种理财，是五大中理财品种最多的平台。','Most diverse earn products: flexible/fixed deposits, staking, liquidity mining, structured products, Hodl & Earn. 2000+ coins supported - most among top 5.','N/A','无额外费用',1),
('gate','web3',1,'完善','Complete','GateWallet：支持多链，内置NFT市场，DEX聚合器，DeFi接入。','GateWallet: multi-chain, built-in NFT marketplace, DEX aggregator, DeFi access.','N/A','Gas费由用户承担',0),
('gate','options',1,'基础','Basic','提供BTC/ETH期权，功能相对基础。','Basic BTC/ETH options functionality.','N/A','Maker 0.02% / Taker 0.03%',0),
('gate','copy',1,'完善','Complete','跟单交易，支持现货和合约策略复制，显示交易员历史绩效。','Copy trading for spot and futures, historical performance display.','N/A','跟单利润分成',0),
('gate','community',1,'完善','Complete','Gate.io广场和社区，支持内容发布和KOL跟随。','Gate.io Square and community for content and KOL following.','N/A','免费',0),
('gate','bot',1,'完善','Complete','网格机器人、DCA机器人、套利机器人。支持策略市场。','Grid bots, DCA bots, arbitrage bots. Strategy marketplace.','N/A','策略收益分成',0),
('gate','otc',1,'完善','Complete','Gate.io OTC服务，支持大额法币兑换。','Gate.io OTC service for large fiat conversions.','N/A','含在报价内',0),
('gate','launchpad',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','Gate Startup（打新平台）：上新速度最快，项目数量最多。适合寻找早期项目的投资者，需持有GT参与。历史项目首日涨幅可观。','Gate Startup: fastest and most new projects. Ideal for early-stage hunters. Requires GT. Strong historical first-day gains.','N/A','免费参与',1),
('gate','ecosystem',1,'完善','Complete','GT（平台币）：用于手续费折扣、打新参与。Gate Chain：自建公链。NFT市场。','GT token: fee discounts, Startup access. Gate Chain: proprietary blockchain. NFT marketplace.','N/A','N/A',0),
-- Bitget
('bitget','spot',1,'良好','Good','支持700+交易对，流动性良好。提供一键买币（快捷交易）功能，适合新手快速入场。','700+ trading pairs with good liquidity. One-click buy feature for quick entry, beginner-friendly.','10x','Maker 0.1% / Taker 0.1%',0),
('bitget','futures',1,'完善','Complete','USDT/USDC/币本位永续合约，最高125倍杠杆，支持200+合约交易对。以合约交易为核心产品之一。','USDT/USDC/coin-margined perpetuals up to 125x, 200+ contract pairs. Futures as core product.','125x','Maker 0.02% / Taker 0.06%',0),
('bitget','margin',1,'完善','Complete','全仓/逐仓杠杆，最高10倍。','Cross/isolated margin up to 10x.','10x','同现货费率',0),
('bitget','tradfi',0,'不支持','Not Supported','暂不提供传统金融产品。','No TradFi products currently.','N/A','N/A',0),
('bitget','earn',1,'完善','Complete','活期/定期理财、质押、流动性挖矿、Launchpool。Bitget Earn产品持续扩充。','Flexible/fixed savings, staking, liquidity mining, Launchpool. Continuously expanding.','N/A','无额外费用',0),
('bitget','web3',1,'完善','Complete','Bitget Wallet（原BitKeep）：支持100+链，内置DEX、NFT市场、DeFi接入。是独立下载量最大的Web3钱包之一。','Bitget Wallet (formerly BitKeep): 100+ chains, built-in DEX, NFT marketplace, DeFi access. One of the most downloaded standalone Web3 wallets.','N/A','Gas费由用户承担',1),
('bitget','options',0,'不支持','Not Supported','暂不提供期权交易。','No options trading currently.','N/A','N/A',0),
('bitget','copy',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','一键跟单（Copy Trading）是Bitget最核心的差异化功能。跟单交易员超10万名，跟单用户超500万。支持现货和合约跟单，数据透明，操作简单，是五大中跟单功能最强的平台。','One-click Copy Trading is Bitgets core differentiator. 100,000+ traders, 5M+ copiers. Spot and futures copy trading, transparent data, simple operation. Best copy trading among top 5.','N/A','跟单利润分成10%',1),
('bitget','community',1,'良好','Good','Bitget社区和内容平台，支持行情讨论。','Bitget community and content platform for market discussions.','N/A','免费',0),
('bitget','bot',1,'完善','Complete','网格机器人、DCA机器人、合约策略机器人。','Grid bots, DCA bots, futures strategy bots.','N/A','策略收益分成',0),
('bitget','otc',1,'完善','Complete','Bitget P2P和OTC服务，支持法币兑换。','Bitget P2P and OTC service for fiat conversions.','N/A','含在报价内',0),
('bitget','launchpad',1,'完善','Complete','Bitget Launchpad：新项目代币首发，需持有BGB参与。','Bitget Launchpad: new token launches requiring BGB.','N/A','免费参与',0),
('bitget','ecosystem',1,'完善','Complete','BGB（平台币）：用于手续费折扣、Launchpad参与、持币分红。Bitget Chain：自建公链。','BGB token: fee discounts, Launchpad, dividend sharing. Bitget Chain: proprietary blockchain.','N/A','N/A',0)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE detailZh=VALUES(detailZh);
command:

('okx','futures',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','全球前二衍生品交易所，USDT/USDC/币本位永续合约，最高125倍杠杆。提供交割合约、期货期权，日均交易量超100亿美元。','Top-2 derivatives exchange globally. USDT/USDC/coin-margined perpetuals up to 125x. Delivery contracts and futures options. $10B+ daily volume.','125x','Maker -0.0025% / Taker 0.0075%（VIP负费率）',1),
('okx','margin',1,'完善','Complete','全仓/逐仓杠杆，最高10倍，支持400+交易对。提供借贷市场，用户可出借资产赚取利息。','Cross/isolated margin up to 10x, 400+ pairs. Lending market where users can lend assets for interest.','10x','同现货费率',0),
('okx','tradfi',1,'领先','Leading','OKX Jumpstart支持股票代币（部分地区）。提供黄金/白银等大宗商品追踪代币，以及加密指数产品。','OKX Jumpstart supports stock tokens (region-dependent). Gold/silver commodity tracking tokens and crypto index products.','N/A','同现货费率',0),
('okx','earn',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','简单赚币（活期/定期）、ETH质押、DeFi挖矿、结构化产品（双币赢）、链上赚币。OKX Earn APY最高可达30%+（高风险）。','Simple Earn (flexible/fixed), ETH staking, DeFi mining, structured products (Dual Currency), on-chain earn. APY up to 30%+ for high-risk.','N/A','无额外费用',1),
('okx','web3',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','OKX Web3钱包：支持80+公链，内置DEX聚合器（OKX DEX），NFT市场，跨链桥，DeFi仪表盘。是五大交易所中Web3功能最完整的平台。','OKX Web3 Wallet: 80+ chains, built-in DEX aggregator (OKX DEX), NFT marketplace, cross-chain bridge, DeFi dashboard. Most complete Web3 suite among top 5 CEXs.','N/A','Gas费由用户承担',1),
('okx','options',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','欧式期权，支持BTC/ETH/SOL等多个标的。提供期权策略组合（跨式、宽跨式等），专业期权交易界面，是五大中期权产品最丰富的交易所。','European options for BTC/ETH/SOL and more. Option strategy combinations (straddle, strangle, etc.). Most comprehensive options suite among top 5.','N/A','Maker 0.02% / Taker 0.03%',1),
('okx','copy',1,'完善','Complete','跟单广场，支持现货和合约跟单。显示交易员30天收益率、胜率、最大回撤。支持设置跟单金额上限和止损。','Copy trading for spot and futures. Shows 30-day ROI, win rate, max drawdown. Set copy amount limits and stop-loss.','N/A','跟单利润分成10%',0),
('okx','community',1,'完善','Complete','OKX广场：社区内容平台，支持发布文章、行情分析、跟随KOL。与OKX Learn教育内容整合。','OKX Square: community content platform for articles, market analysis, KOL following. Integrated with OKX Learn education content.','N/A','免费',0),
('okx','bot',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','网格机器人（现货/合约/无限网格）、DCA定投、套利机器人、信号机器人。支持TradingView信号接入，是五大中机器人功能最强的平台。','Grid bots (spot/futures/infinite grid), DCA, arbitrage, signal bots. TradingView signal integration. Most powerful bot suite among top 5.','N/A','策略收益分成',1),
('okx','otc',1,'完善','Complete','OKX P2P和OTC交易台，支持大额法币兑换，100+法币，提供专属客户经理服务。','OKX P2P and OTC desk for large fiat conversions, 100+ fiat currencies, dedicated account manager.','N/A','含在报价内',0),

('okx','ecosystem',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','OKB（平台币）：用于手续费折扣、Jumpstart参与。OKX Chain（OKC）：EVM兼容公链。X Layer：基于Polygon zkEVM的Layer2。NFT市场。','OKB token: fee discounts, Jumpstart access. OKX Chain (OKC): EVM-compatible. X Layer: Polygon zkEVM-based Layer2. NFT marketplace.','N/A','N/A',1),

('bybit','futures',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','全球前三衍生品交易所，USDT/USDC/币本位永续合约，最高100倍杠杆。以合约交易起家，风控机制完善，深受专业交易员青睐。','Top-3 derivatives exchange. USDT/USDC/coin-margined perpetuals up to 100x. Founded on futures trading, robust risk management, favored by professionals.','100x','Maker 0.01% / Taker 0.055%（最低费率之一）',1),
('bybit','margin',1,'完善','Complete','全仓/逐仓杠杆，最高10倍。提供统一保证金账户（UTA），可用一个账户管理现货、合约、期权保证金。','Cross/isolated margin up to 10x. Unified Trading Account (UTA) manages spot, futures, and options margin in one account.','10x','同现货费率',0),
('bybit','tradfi',1,'领先','Leading','Bybit MT5：提供外汇、美股CFD、商品CFD等传统金融产品，是五大中TradFi产品最丰富的平台。','Bybit MT5: forex, US stock CFDs, commodity CFDs. Most comprehensive TradFi product suite among top 5 CEXs.','N/A','差价含在报价内',1),
('bybit','earn',1,'完善','Complete','活期/定期理财、ETH/SOL质押、流动性挖矿、双币投资、结构化产品。Bybit Savings APY竞争力强。','Flexible/fixed savings, ETH/SOL staking, liquidity mining, dual investment, structured products. Competitive Bybit Savings APY.','N/A','无额外费用',0),
('bybit','web3',1,'完善','Complete','Bybit Web3钱包：支持多链，内置NFT市场（Bybit NFT），DEX聚合器，GameFi中心。','Bybit Web3 Wallet: multi-chain support, built-in NFT marketplace, DEX aggregator, GameFi hub.','N/A','Gas费由用户承担',0),
('bybit','options',1,'完善','Complete','欧式期权，支持BTC/ETH。提供期权策略工具，适合有经验的期权交易者。','European options for BTC/ETH. Option strategy tools for experienced traders.','N/A','Maker 0.02% / Taker 0.03%',0),
('bybit','copy',1,'完善','Complete','跟单交易，支持合约策略复制。显示交易员历史数据，支持设置跟单参数。','Copy trading for futures strategies. Historical trader data, customizable copy parameters.','N/A','跟单利润分成10%',0),
('bybit','community',1,'良好','Good','Bybit广场：社区内容平台，支持行情讨论和KOL内容。','Bybit Square: community content platform for market discussions and KOL content.','N/A','免费',0),
('bybit','bot',1,'完善','Complete','网格机器人（现货/合约）、DCA机器人、套利机器人。支持策略市场，可复制他人策略。','Grid bots (spot/futures), DCA bots, arbitrage bots. Strategy marketplace to copy others strategies.','N/A','策略收益分成',0),
('bybit','otc',1,'完善','Complete','Bybit P2P和OTC服务，支持大额法币兑换，提供专属报价。','Bybit P2P and OTC service for large fiat conversions with dedicated quotes.','N/A','含在报价内',0),
('bybit','launchpad',1,'完善','Complete','Bybit Launchpad：新项目代币首发，需持有BIT或完成任务参与。','Bybit Launchpad: new token launches requiring BIT or task completion.','N/A','免费参与',0),
('bybit','ecosystem',1,'完善','Complete','BIT（平台币）：用于手续费折扣和Launchpad。Mantle Network：Bybit支持的以太坊Layer2网络，TVL超10亿美元。','BIT token: fee discounts and Launchpad. Mantle Network: Bybit-backed Ethereum Layer2 with $1B+ TVL.','N/A','N/A',0),

('gate','spot',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','支持2200+交易对，上币速度最快，是新项目最先上线的平台之一。适合寻找早期小市值项目的投资者。','2200+ trading pairs, fastest new listing speed. One of the first platforms for new projects. Ideal for early-stage small-cap hunters.','10x','Maker 0.2% / Taker 0.2%（VIP可降至0.015%）',1),
('gate','futures',1,'良好','Good','USDT本位永续合约，最高100倍杠杆，支持400+合约交易对。流动性略逊于前三，但品种丰富。','USDT-margined perpetuals up to 100x, 400+ contract pairs. Liquidity slightly below top 3 but wide variety.','100x','Maker -0.015% / Taker 0.016%（Maker负费率）',1),
('gate','margin',1,'完善','Complete','全仓/逐仓杠杆，最高10倍。借贷市场利率透明，用户可出借资产赚取利息。','Cross/isolated margin up to 10x. Transparent lending market rates, users can lend for interest.','10x','同现货费率',0),
('gate','tradfi',1,'基础','Basic','提供部分股票代币化产品，覆盖范围相对有限。','Limited stock tokenization products.','N/A','同现货费率',0),

('gate','web3',1,'完善','Complete','GateWallet：支持多链，内置NFT市场，DEX聚合器，DeFi接入。','GateWallet: multi-chain, built-in NFT marketplace, DEX aggregator, DeFi access.','N/A','Gas费由用户承担',0),

('gate','launchpad',1,'旗舰级','Flagship','Gate Startup（打新平台）：上新速度最快，项目数量最多。适合寻找早期项目的投资者，需持有GT参与。历史项目首日涨幅可观。','Gate Startup: fastest and most new projects. Ideal for early-stage hunters. Requires GT. Strong historical first-day gains.','N/A','免费参与',1),
